title.rendered: Land Rover & Range Rover Servicing Sydney

content.rendered:
Land Rover and Range Rover are two of the most iconic and well-known cars in the world, how well do you really know about them? In this article, we will detail Land Rover & Range Rover’s origins, the company today, popular models and Land Rover servicing & Range Rover servicing. We will also cover some frequently asked questions from consumers about the two popular cars. 

So whether you are a current Land Rover or Range Rover owner looking for Range Rover service in Sydney or a potential Land Rover or Range Rover owner, this article will answer all your questions.

The Origins of Land Rover

From their humble beginnings as a sketch by Maurice Wilks, to becoming known for creating luxury SUV models that are perfect for tackling the wilderness or the concrete city jungle roads with family and friends, the history of Land Rover is an interesting one. Influenced largely by his experience with Jeeps and other vehicles on military duty overseas, the four wheel drive body style became a brand staple and even originally stuck with military colours for the first few models.

The Land Rover series originally belonged to the Rover Company (British Leyland Motor Corporation) up until 1978, with the parent company later splitting and Land Rover falling under the British Aerospace ownership. In 1994, Land Rover was acquired by BMW, and then eventually sold to Ford. In 2004, Tata Motors acquired Land Rover and Jaguar from Ford. Over time the brand has had its transitions but it has still maintained its status as a luxurious and stylish SUV off-roader capable of anything.

The Origins of Range Rover

A big part of the Land Rover heritage and legacy comes from the Range Rover, where the concept was started in 1969 and was named the ‘Range Rover Velar’. A year later the 3-Door Range Rover hit the market and received widespread critical acclaim being the first vehicle with permanent 4 Wheel Drive capabilities. In 1981, the 4-Door Range Rover was released, pushing the popularity of the brand to the next level. Now over 40 years later, the Range Rover continues to be a big player in the luxury SUV space and some even consider it a cultural icon.

Benefits of Owning a Land Rover or Range Rover

Land Rovers are a popular and really sought after SUV for good reason. They have distinct style, incredible off-road and 4×4 capabilities, luxury features and offer great comfort to drivers.

Comfort and Luxury

Land Rover’s are spacious and comfortable due to their high suspension and longer wheelbases, offering passengers more leg room when travelling over potholes or dips in the road or while enjoying a smooth ride with no bumps. They come with all the bells and whistles you would inspect from a luxury saloon or sports car while delivering the comfort of a SUV.

Ease of Driving & Off-Roading Capabilities

The Land Rover has always been known as a vehicle for those who lead an adventurous life. Its inception came from being designed to hit rough terrains and despite its luxuries, it retains the ability of dealing with obstacles both on and off the road.

Performance

The Land Rover is a beast when it comes to performance. The luxury SUV has excellent acceleration and braking ability, beating out similar vehicles with top end speed as well as agile handling which are not often found in this market segment either.

The vehicle’s power train offers petrol or diesel options that provide enough torque off the line while still being able to retain respectable braking distances at high speeds, making these cars the perfect choices if you want more than just good looks but also power on-demand where needed.

Benefits of Regular Land Rover Servicing and Range Rover Servicing

With regular car servicing, your car will be more reliable and safe with the added benefit of financial savings in the form of the decreased replacement of major components and less overall wear and tear. With an improved fuel efficiency thanks to a healthy vehicle you can stretch those dollars even further – how good does that sound?

Land Rover Service Sydney

Ensuring you regularly book a Land Rover service in Sydney is crucial for the longevity of your vehicle, especially considering the size of Land Rover engines and the upkeep needed to maintain consistent performance. It is recommended to book your Land Rover service every 6 months or 12,000kms (whichever comes first).

Range Rover Service Sydney

Just like other Land Rover models, the Range Rover servicing is no different. It is vital to have regular scheduled servicing to maintain your car’s optimum performance. By simply booking into a Range Rover servicing centre every 6 months or 10,000kms (whichever comes first), you will ensure that your pride and joy is well maintained and any mechanical issues are fixed before they become much bigger and more expensive problems.

A Typical Land Rover Service & Range Rover Service Involves

  • Oil Checks
  • Brakes
  • Transmission
  • Wheels and Tyres
  • Suspension & Steering
  • Logbook Servicing
  • Tune Up
  • Fuel Injection System
  • Car Battery 
  • Air Conditioning

Independent Logbook Servicing

Due to recent changes to consumer law by the Department of Fair Trading, you are no longer obligated to use your dealership’s Land Rover service or Range Rover service while it is under warranty. You have the choice of choosing an independent Land Rover Specialist in Sydney or an independent Range Rover servicing centre such as VAR Automotive.

The truth is that servicing performed at an independent car servicing centre is more in depth and covers a wider scope than servicing provided at a dealership or by manufacturers. You will also receive more flexible options and better pricing and you will not void your manufacturer’s warranty.

Land Rover Range Rover Service at VAR Automotive

With their prestige and timeless heritage as an off-roader, Land Rover and Range Rovers are a go to choice for adventure seekers with luxury taste buds, however as with any vehicle, you must maintain a regular Land Rover service and Range Rover Service schedule, to ensure your car is performing in top condition.

For all your Range Rover servicing and to visit a Land Rover specialist in Sydney, be sure to book an appointment at VAR Automotive with two prestige service centres conveniently located in Sydney.
